lines.text: Tonight we have a real treat for you, ladies and gentlemen. A major recording star. Many number one hits, awards, recorded in 12 different languages... and frankly let us all down. But here she is tonight, Ms. Connie Francis!
[Connie comes on stage and performs a disco version of "Where The Boys Are"]
Why did you wait so long?
Well, the truth is, I wouldn't be anywhere if it weren't for this man.
